title: Quandary Aminu vs The Butterfly Man
description: When an illicit trade deal goes wrong and Quandary is blamed for it, she goes on the run to avoid the crosshairs of a bioengineered killer that only lives for 24 hours. If Q can evade it for that long, she just might survive.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Rich  Larson
